newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Reef sees 96/97 profit below forecast.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Reef sees 96/97 profit below forecast.

text.p: Reef Casino Trust, operator of the Cairns casino in northern Queensland, said results for the year to June 30, 1997 would be lower than prospectus forecasts.

"The results forecast for 1996/97 show a shortfall against the original prospectus. Revenues of the operations will be approximately 73 percent of prospectus estimates," Reef said in a statement accompanying its 1995/96 results.
In its prospectus, Reef Casino forecast an operating profit before tax of A$12.99 million for the year to June 30, 1997 on sales of A$100.40 million.
Reef earlier reported a maiden net loss of A$26.80 million in 1995/96 for the period from its opening in January 31.
Reef shares were steady at 62 cents on Friday.
